dt: {bc}to impose, involve, or imply as a necessary accompaniment or result
{bc}to restrict (property) by limiting the inheritance to the owner's {d_link|lineal|lineal} descendants or to a particular class thereof
{bc}to confer, assign, or transmit (something) for an indefinitely long time {bc}to confer, assign, or transmit as if by entail
{bc}to fix (a person) permanently in some condition or status

dt.t: {wi}entail{/wi} him and his heirs unto the crown

quotes.t: Pregnancy involves the bodily dependence of the unborn child on its mother; in many cases, it {qword}entails{/qword} a significant physical burden.

… it was a Master Highlighter Event, a two-day guest appearance by one of Kinkade's specially trained assistants, who would highlight any picture bought during the event for free. Highlighting a picture is not that different from highlighting your hair: it {qword}entails{/qword} stippling tiny bright dots of paint on the picture to give it more texture and luminescence.
Discourse is a social as well as an intellectual activity; it {qword}entails{/qword} interaction between minds, and it revolves around something possessed in common.
Life is a difficult and complicated enterprise. It {qword}entails{/qword} joy but also suffering, gain but also loss, hope but also despair.

et: Middle English {it}entailen, entaillen{/it}, from {et_link|en-:1|en-:1} + {it}taile, taille{/it} limitation {ma}{mat|tail:4|}{/ma}
shortdef: to impose, involve, or imply as a necessary accompaniment or result
to restrict (property) by limiting the inheritance to the owner's lineal descendants or to a particular class thereof
to confer, assign, or transmit (something) for an indefinitely long time : to confer, assign, or transmit as if by entail
